text: Hi all, I am working on the development of an Email template but I choose as drag and drop format the email template and not the page template, and now It is not clear how I can add the css and js file
for the page there is "add stylesheet" but the email template no
Typically you don't have external stylesheets for email, the styles should be in the head and/or inline. You wouldn't use a js file at all.
